answers.answer: I am also 17+3! I get headaches that come on suddenly like that but mine stick around and are very painful :-( I can feel them behind my eyes the worst. I talked to my doc last week and he suggested that I try a little caffeine first and make sure I drink plenty of water. He also prescribed Tylenol #3 in case they become unbearable. Hope this helps and good luck with everything!

It is more than likely to be the blood flow. It can also be from hormones. But, just to be safe, tell the dr. It can be a sign of high blood pressure and sometimes gestational diabetes. Hope you feel better soon. Both of you. :)
Thanks so much. I definitely mention it next week at my appointment

I am 19 weeks and I have been having them for 2 weeks. They are pretty horrible.  I feel pulsating in head and behind eyes. Had appointment yesterday and dr said try a little caffeine, drink plenty of water,  and also suggest sleeping longer or taking naps frequently.

question: Hey ladies, just wondering if anyone experiences sudden headaches that come on really fast and strong? Its happened a few times the last few days. Its not even so much pain as I can just feel my heartbeat pounding behind my eyes and in my temples. Its bad enough I need to lay down and close my eyes most times.  Just extra blood flow or what? I'm 17weeks 3days
title: Sudden Headaches
